div.div: Amazon Donates $10,000 of STEM Equipment to Holmes Middle School
It's a great day at Covington Independent Public Schools.

Superintendent's Message
In our quest to become a national leader in education, Covington Independent Public Schools developed a Strategic Plan that provides a clear focus on how to get there. The Strategic Plan is posted in all of our schools and this year, the district calendar reflects the plan and the roadmap to success for our students.
